item.description:
Come up Thursday evening and get first tracks at Wildcat Friday AM. Enjoy the savings with a discounted lift ticket at Wildcat for $9 on Friday 2/26. You can then add a second day and ski at Wildcat for only $39 on Saturday. Sunday is the Mt. Washington Valley Chocolate Festival. You can cross country ski, snowshoe, or drive your way to a different locale and grab a delicious chocolate treat. This runs from 11 to 4 on Sunday 2/28.

Here is the link to Wildcat
$9 Friday Lift Ticket @ Wildcat

Here is the link to the Mt. Washington Valley Chocolate Festival
Buy tickets here for the chocolate festival

Itinerary
- Arrive Thursday night @ Wedeln after 9PM
- Friday AM - Ski @ Wildcat
- Friday 10 PM - Partake and judge our bartending competition
- Saturday - Ski @ Wildcat
- Saturday - Enjoy Apres ski events and dinner.
- Sunday AM - Pack up by 11 AM and head out to the Chocolate Festival

Costs
- You are responsible for you own ski equipment or rentals (ski. boots, poles), lift ticket costs, and Chocolate Festival cost.
- Guest Fees to stay at Wedeln = $20 per night x 3 nights = $60 (minimum 2 nights stay or $40)
- Meals - are currently not available at the club - this may change if there is enough interest. Please indicate in the RSVP questions whether you are interested in meals or not.
- Additional fees apply for payment via Pay Pal or Amazon Payments.
- Apres Ski options exist Saturday PM - These are optional and should you wish to participate and payable once you arrive.

Please be aware that although couples are welcome all bedrooms are same sex only, most rooms are 2 bunkbeds. If you are looking to meet new people, ski and have fun - then come on up.

Please bring twin sheets, blanket, pillow, towel, and slippers for the showers. 21+ only.

Note: Please answer all RSVP questions. Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club reserves the right to limit the number of guests at the club. If you are already a member, please RSVP NO here on Meetup. - but feel free to indicate in notes that you will be in attendance. You can RSVP through our normal channel.

Please feel free to let me know if you have any questions, issues, or concerns.

Regards,
Jonathan
item.name: $9 Wildcat 2/26 and $20 Mt Washington Valley Chocolate Festival 2/28
